sent.trans: 他根本不是（一个）学者。（比较：He is not a scholar。他不是一个学者。）

sent.orig: When we use "he", we generalize for both sex.
sent.trans: 当我们用he时，我们泛指男女。

sent.orig: At first he was most dictatorial and aggressive in what he said,but when he realised that he would get nowhere by that means,he began to sing another tune.
sent.trans: 起初他的说法十分专横武断，但当他认识到这样做行不通的时候，他就开始改弦易辙了。

sent.orig: He was so excited that he could not speak.;He was too excited to speak.;He was so excited that words failed him.
sent.trans: 他太兴奋，连话都说不出来了。
